description:
GroupDocs.Comparison for .NET is a lightweight library that allows you to merge and diff two versions of a document. Supported file formats include: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, ODT, TXT, HTML.

The library comes with a web UI that allows you to display differences between documents with a redline change tracking view. The UI can easily be customized and integrated into your own app. You can also build your own UI from scratch or use the library without the UI at all.

Key Features Include:

1. Localization support
2. Moved content detection in word comparison
3. Improved excel comparison with detection of inserted/deleted columns
4. Improved pdf comparison
5. Modified widget initialization code

For more details on the library, please visit the GroupDocs website at: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-comparison-library

Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test the GroupDocs.Comparison for .NET library without limitations, please request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
Improvements
		- Update PDF engine with image changes detection, style changes and content formatting
		- Added text comparison engine for text formats: html, json, xml, txt, etc.

		Bug fixes:
		- DOCOMPARE-1081 If document has macros comparing will fail with fatal error
		- DOCOMPARE-1018 xls comparing failed
		- DOCOMPARE-1017 SaveHandler doesn't called
		- DOCOMPARE-1032 Overwriting of cells after deleting rows or columns
		- DOCOMPARE-1030 If use dots(.) in the URL comparison will fail
		- DOCOMPARE-1032 Overwriting of cells after deleting rows or columns
		- DOCOMPARE-994  Changes of Groupdocs.Viewer brought the displaying samples of Groupdocs.Comparison is broken
		- DOCOMPARE-970 This Node can't be set at this location
		- DOCOMPARE-955 Fix Comparison for Cloud which stopped working on staging
		- DOCOMPARE-915 Compare doc and docx doesn't work
		- DOCOMPARE-824 Application totaly crash if to compare specific docx files
		- DOCOMPARE-823 Comparison doesn't shows result document
		- DOCOMPARE-688 It's impossible to compare XML documents without renaming them to the TXT
		- DOCOMPARE-685 ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception is thrown when comparing two PDF files (attached)
		- DOCOMPARE-686 Cannot disable a "Summary page" when comparing the PDF documents
		- DOCOMPARE-636 Issue with xlsx comparison
		- DOCOMPARE-594 Comparison.NET - Issue with formating of the target document in to result
		- DOCOMPARE-606 Incorrect Page number in Navigation bar after specific steps in Chrome
		- DOCOMPARE-635 Modifying init method to allow invocation more than once
		- DOCOMPARE-597 Comparison.NET - "Server Error in '/' Application" error occurs after compare particular document
		- DOCOMPARE-578 Comparison.NET - Style change isn't displayed in RHS panel after compare for particular files
		- DOCOMPARE-544 PDF comparison do not detect any changes at all
		- DOCOMPARE-603 Comparison.NET - Style changes aren't displayed after comparison for particular documents
		- DOCOMPARE-600 Comparison.NET - Second page is not fully displayed without license
		- DOCOMPARE-592 Comparison.NET - Incorrect change count is displayed in RHS panel in some cases with RU locale
		- DOCOMPARE-353 "Thumbs" tab is unlocked for scrolling in IE
		- DOCOMPARE-296 Comparison.Net - User is not able to scroll pages with the help of slider
